# unifiedpolicy_rule (Data Source)

Returns the details of a Unified Policy rule by its ID. Rules define the specific parameter values for policy evaluation and are based on rule templates.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the rule to query.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the rule was created.
- `created_by` (String) User who created the rule.
- `description` (String) Free-text description of the rule purpose.
- `is_custom` (Boolean) Indicates if the rule is user-defined (true) or predefined (false).
- `name` (String) The name of the rule.
- `parameters` (Attributes List) Array of parameter name/value pairs that match the template definition. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--parameters))
- `template_id` (String) The ID of the template the rule is based on.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the rule was last updated.
- `updated_by` (String) User who last updated the rule.

<a id="nestedatt--parameters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `parameters`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Name of the template parameter.
- `value` (String) The value assigned to the parameter.
